title: Zelensky says Russia is proposing huge economic deals with U.S.
summary_full: The Ukrainian president said the Trump administration was pushing for a June deadline to end Russia’s war.
summary_public: The Ukrainian president said the Trump administration was pushing for a June deadline to end Russia’s war.
